contentrichtext.text: '''Voroshilov''' may refer to: *Voroshilov, former name of [[Ussuriysk]], Primorsky Krai, Russia *[[Kliment Voroshilov tank]], a Soviet tank series *[[Soviet cruiser Voroshilov|Soviet cruiser ''Voroshilov'']], a [[Kirov class cruiser]] ==People== *[[Kliment Voroshilov]] (1881–1969), Marshal of the Soviet Union *[[Viktor Voroshilov]], Soviet footballer *[[Vladimir Voroshilov]] (1930—2001), Russian TV personality {{See also|Voroshilovsky (disambiguation)}} {{disambiguation|surname}}
